context.com.cfx.monsanto.group: context associated with a group (node) in the tree.  The right side reports will be attached to this context
context.com.cfx.monsanto.group.direct: context associated with a group (node) in the tree.  The right side reports will be attached to this context
context.com.cfx.monsanto.device.inventory: context associated to a device node in the tree.  The right side device specific reports will be on this context.
context.com.cfx.monsanto.wan-interfaces.inventor: context associated to a wan-interface in the tree.  The right side device specific reports for wan-ifs will be on this context.
context.com.cfx.monsanto.dashboard.regional: region specific dashboard reports will be on this context.
